name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Engineering Engineer with a strong focus on programming skills, including **Python** for statistical and data analysis. Proficient in utilizing **R**, **SPSS**, and **Stata** for academic writing and research projects. Adept in applying citation standards such as APA, Vancouver, Chicago, and Harvard in technical documentation. Experienced in self-management and achieving autonomy in demanding environments.

With over 13 years of experience in full stack development across the healthcare and financial industries, I bring a wealth of knowledge in delivering high-performance applications. I possess strong skills in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and **Flutter**, alongside hands-on expertise in frontend frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, as well as backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My background includes building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing, with proficiency in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. I have a proven track record in implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines while ensuring compliance with regulatory standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

experience.responsibilities:
Demonstrated proficiency in programming by designing and building full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech using **Python (FastAPI)** and incorporating statistical software methodologies applied to data for research advancements.
Conducted extensive research, analyzing data with **R**, **SPSS**, and **Stata**, resulting in high-quality academic publications adhering to various citation standards including **APA**, **Vancouver**, **Chicago**, and **Harvard**.
Implemented robust CI/CD pipelines, emphasizing self-management and autonomy, utilizing tools such as **GitHub Actions** and **CircleCI**, ensuring efficient deployment workflows and comprehensive testing of software versions.
Managed and integrated advanced statistical models for decision-making and predictive analytics, deploying them seamlessly within applications, backed by comprehensive data infrastructure using **PostgreSQL** and **MongoDB**.
Led initiatives in resolving complex statistical research problems by leveraging critical programming skills in **Python** to develop algorithms tailored for data analysis that improved efficiency by **30%** in project timelines.
Collaborated effectively within cross-functional teams to conduct research and statistical analysis, enhancing product features tailored to user needs and abiding by ethical standards of statistical integrity.
Composed detailed technical documentation and implemented testing strategies that upheld quality assurance across various programming environments using tools such as **Jest** and **Cypress**.
Utilized language proficiency to communicate complex technical concepts and findings clearly to stakeholders, fostering collaborative efforts toward common research goals.
Exercised autonomy in project management, taking ownership of the coding process and ensuring milestones were met ahead of deadlines, demonstrating time management skills in a fast-paced development environment.

Utilized strong **Python** programming skills to develop statistical models and data analyses, ensuring accurate financial insights and reporting.
Conducted rigorous research and analysis of financial data using **R**, **SPSS**, and **Stata** to inform strategic decisions, demonstrating proficiency in statistical software.
Implemented data-driven decision-making processes through meticulous academic writing, adhering to **APA**, **Vancouver**, **Chicago**, and **Harvard** citation standards.
Leveraged self-management and autonomy to maintain high-quality work standards while working independently on complex engineering projects.
Optimized financial data processes by programming ETL pipelines with **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, enhancing data ingestion efficiency by **30%**.
Developed and maintained machine learning models for fraud detection utilizing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, improving detection rates by **25%**.
Designed interactive front-end applications using **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, and **Next.js** to facilitate user-friendly financial tools, leading to a **40%** increase in user engagement.
Architected an event-driven system with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, streamlining communication for more than **1000** transactions per minute.

• Developed and implemented complex programming solutions utilizing **Python** and data analysis tools such as **R**, **SPSS**, and **Stata** to enhance data-driven decision-making processes.
• Conducted comprehensive research and statistical analysis, ensuring adherence to citation standards (APA, Vancouver, Chicago, Harvard) for all academic and technical documentation.
• Managed and prioritized projects autonomously, ensuring timely delivery of high-quality technical solutions while demonstrating strong self-management skills.
• Collaborated on cross-functional teams to deliver innovative engineering projects, applying a combination of analysis and programming expertise to optimize services and systems.
• Demonstrated language proficiency in technical documentation, ensuring clarity and compliance with professional standards across diverse projects.
• Worked with data visualization and statistical software to interpret complex datasets, facilitating insightful reporting and optimized project outcomes.
• Applied rigorous academic writing principles to translate technical findings into accessible documentation for varying audiences.
